book.synopsis: Taking readers from 1948 to 1967 in Sinai, Jerusalem, and Washington, D.C., a stunning depiction of the conflicts that shaped the struggling nation of Israel follows the adventures of a sinister Mossad man, a religious ace fighter pilot, the daughter of a CIA man, and more. Reprint. 12,000 first printing.
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 1.28 Pounds, Width: 1.77 Inches
